commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: There you are! Were you watching me?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course! That was an awesome live show. I got goosebumps!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Glad to hear that! Thank you so much! I'm surprised myself at how much of a response I felt!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Did you see everyone's faces when my song started to play? They all looked stunned.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. It's only natural for everyone to be surprised since it has such a different feel from your last song.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But I could tell that they got swept into your world straight away!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Right! I could feel the fire in everyone gradually growing stronger, and their cheers made my skin tingle and set my heart alight!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's because the character profile you came up with was perfect. It wasn't you, but a completely different school idol on stage.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I was actually a little worried about how it would all end up, but I'm glad I took the risk.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yup, yup. Watching everyone become captivated by your world really moved me. It made me as happy as if it were me on stage.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Chuckle* We did create the character together, so you should be happy about your own creation, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* You're right. But I saw another school idol out there as well.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Huh? What do you mean?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Together with the girl born from your notebook was also a Shizuku who looked like she was having a lot of fun.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Really...?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Actually, there's something I need to apologize to you about.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You kept saying that you love to act, yet I said it would be better for you to show your true self. My advice was misplaced, so...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Not at all. I'm only here today because of those words. I was only able to rethink things about myself and acting thanks to what you said.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm absolutely grateful to you. I would never think otherwise, so please don't apologize to me.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: If you apologize to me right now, it'll make it difficult for me to take you up on your goodwill from now on.

commands.select_args: ||Then I take back my apology.|| select_1
||Feel free to keep relying on me.|| select_2

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shizuku... Okay, then I take back my apology.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Sorry for being so selfish.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I want you to keep turning to me, especially since you have a pretty strong tendency to hold back.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: R-Really? I thought I was more than sufficiently reliant on you already.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nope, not at all. It'd make me happier if you relied on me even more.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I-It kind of makes me feel embarrassed to be told in such a straightforward manner.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Your unique strength was clearly on show at today's event.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: My unique strength?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You have as many means of expression as you have characters to play. Your possibilities are endless, you know? There's only one of you, but it feels like there are multiple people. That's amazing.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Giggle* I actually have a pretty good idea of the next character I want to portray, and there are so many more characters I want to live with and develop!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It'd be great if I could one day become my ideal school idol with those characters.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: There's still a long way to go, but I want to keep taking on different challenges. I'm sure I'll continue to seek a lot of advice, so I'm counting on you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course! Let's do our very best together, Shizuku!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Right! Having you with me is so reassuring!
